inclusion.criterion: Height of usual place of residence
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: less than 2,500 metres above sea level

exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 57-year-old man with abdominal pain and vomiting. He drinks around 60 units of alcohol per week and smokes 22 cigarettes per day.
